newsitem.title: USA: AMBAC qualifies seven muni issues for insurance.
newsitem.headline: AMBAC qualifies seven muni issues for insurance.

text.p: AMBAC Indemnity Corp. said Thursday it qualified for bond insurance the following seven municipal issues scheduled for competive sale today:
--San Jose Finance Authority, Calif., $6.935 million lease revs.
--Mc Pherson County SD, Kan., $5.447 million school building GOs.
--Averill Park CSD, N.Y., $7.590 million school improvement.
--Island Trees UFSD, N.Y., $5.7 million school district bonds.
